name: IPAddress
desc: An abstract protocol you use to interact with IP addresses.

items.name: init?(String)
items.desc: Initializes an IP address with a string.

items.name: init?(Data, NWInterface?)
items.desc: Initializes an IP address with data.

items.name: var rawValue: Data
items.desc: The raw data of an IP address.

items.name: var interface: NWInterface?
items.desc: The interface associated with this address, such as the IPv6 scoped interface.

items.name: var isLinkLocal: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether this address is in a link-local range.

items.name: var isLoopback: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether this address is a loopback address for the local device.

items.name: var isMulticast: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether this address is a multicast address.
